enabled.description:
Enables or disables the new user. To enable the user, set to
``true`` . To disable the user, set to ``false`` . Default is
``true`` .

email.description: The email address for the new user.

default_project_id.description: The default tenant for the new user.

password.description: The user password. Required for some authentication back ends.

domain_id.description: The ID of the domain for the new user.
